title: How does the quick share menu choose contacts?
content:
Hello,

I would like to know how the sharing menu selects the contacts that should appear?

I ask this because the chosen contacts are not relevant to me because they are people I do not have much contact with.

Why for example my wife does not appear in this menu? It's with her that I communicate the most every day, it would be more relevant to me. At first she appeared and was in first position and one day she disappeared ...

For information, I use Google Messages to communicate.
category: Contacts, Calls, Voicemail, Google Pixel 4 XL
